1: צַדִּ֤יק <sup>6662 </sup> <n>Righteous</n> אַתָּה֙ <sup>859 </sup> <n>O</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[art] thou O LORD</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>would</n> אָרִ֖יב <sup>7378 </sup> <n>when I plead</n> אֵלֶ֑יךָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>you</n> אַ֤ךְ <sup>389 </sup> <n>Indeed</n> מִשְׁפָּטִים֙ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>with thee of [thy] judgments</n> אֲדַבֵּ֣ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>with thee yet let me talk</n> אוֹתָ֔ךְ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> מַדּ֗וּעַ <sup>4069 </sup> <n>Why</n> דֶּ֤רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>Wherefore doth the way</n> רְשָׁעִים֙ <sup>7563 </sup> <n>of the wicked</n> צָלֵ֔חָה <sup>6743 </sup> <n>prosper</n> שָׁל֖וּ <sup>7951 </sup> <n>? 4: עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> מָתַי֙ <sup>4970 </sup> <n>How</n> תֶּאֱבַ֣ל <sup>56 </sup> <n>mourn</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>How long shall the land</n> וְעֵ֥שֶׂב <sup>6212 </sup> <n>and the herbs</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of every</n> הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <sup>7704 </sup> <n>of every field</n> יִיבָ֑שׁ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>wither</n> מֵרָעַ֣ת <sup>7451 </sup> <n>for the wickedness</n> יֹֽשְׁבֵי־ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>of them that dwell</n> בָ֗הּ סָפְתָ֤ה <sup>5595 </sup> <n>are consumed</n> בְהֵמוֹת֙ <sup>929 </sup> <n>therein? the beasts</n> וָע֔וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>and the birds</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> אָמְר֔וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>because they said</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>He will not</n> יִרְאֶ֖ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>He shall not see</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אַחֲרִיתֵֽנוּ׃ <sup>319 </sup> <n>our last end</n>
